name: GeeksDeck
description:
We are able to help start-ups and SMEs on three levels - UI/UX, software development and business solutions. We are also open to cooperate with larger enterprises.

Our team prepare graphic prototypes for all of your ideas, that are in line with the current trends.


Apps created by our developers have the best quality and development process is fully transparent for customer.


We cooperate with experienced investors interested in business support and financial help for start-ups.

Our Geeks help in turning the most complicated and dreamlike ideas into reality.
Website: geeksdeck.com
We develop apps to platforms like:
•    iOS
•    Apple Watch
•    Apple TV
•    Android
•    Android Wear
•    Android TV
•    Web
If you need something more than listed above, feel free to contact us. We are Geeks, we will help you!
